20101209132438.500|20101209132439.333|CCO|    EXACTLY.
20101209132439.333|20101209132440.167|CCO|        
20101209132440.167|20101209132441.000|CCO|        SEE YOU GUYS TOMORROW.
20101209132441.000|20101209132442.667|CCO|  In 1968, as whaling continued
20101209132442.667|20101209132444.333|CCO|        
20101209132444.333|20101209132446.000|CCO|              worldwide,
20101209132446.000|20101209132447.667|CCO|the first recordings of humpback
20101209132447.667|20101209132449.333|CCO|    
20101209132449.333|20101209132451.000|CCO|        songs were released.
20101209132451.000|20101209132452.000|CCO|    
20101209132452.000|20101209132453.000|CCO|      Public reaction led to
20101209132453.000|20101209132454.000|CCO|    
20101209132454.000|20101209132455.000|CCO|        international bans,
20101209132455.000|20101209132456.000|CCO|  and whale populations began to
20101209132456.000|20101209132457.000|CCO|            
20101209132457.000|20101209132458.000|CCO|            recover.
